price: 48. Maalinka marka wejiyadooda lagu dhex jiidi Naarta (waxaa lagu odhan): Dhadhamiya taabashada Naarta.
arabic: يَوۡمَ يُسۡحَبُونَ فِي ٱلنَّارِ عَلَىٰ وُجُوهِهِمۡ ذُوقُواْ مَسَّ سَقَرَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yawma yus'ḥabūna fī al-nāri ʿalā wujūhihim dhūqū massa saqara
